table_caption: Summary of DTI correlations with sarcasm identification in patient groups.
table_foot: Diffusion tensor tractography (DTI) associations of altered white matter diffusivity metrics associated with TASIT total sarcasm identification score are summarised. Cluster numbering indexes statistically independent anatomical associations within each contrast generated using the FSL cluster command. Results are corrected for multiple comparisons at whole brain level using family-wise error correction (p = 0.05) and ordered by statistical significance and size (number of voxels in the cluster). Peak co-ordinates and anatomical associations are based on centre-of-gravity of cluster and are displayed in MNI standard space.
